item.title: Hi Tony, I used to use Dolimo jars as beer glass i...
item.description: Hi Tony, I used to use Dolimo jars as beer glass in Australia as they didn't have pint size glasses over there and think you could be on to something. I hope you can come punting next Saturday (23 Aug)... 12 noon, Cherwell Boathouse!
item.dc:creator: Matt Prescott

item.title: This is very interesting... I agree with you Tony....
item.description: This is very interesting... I agree with you Tony. Matt
item.dc:creator: Matt Prescott
